name: Binding Lights
description:
A mysterious structure lies ahead, completly enclosed from humanity and undiscovered from any living creature. As a young adventurer you find your way inside it's many layers. In it, you realise the complexity of the structure, not knowing where it will bring you. 

Caught by the blink of an eye, you fall for the sudden change on your body due to the secret curse. Not knowing what is going, you still continue.

As you venture inside, you find yourself guided by the light not knowing what's to come, will you reach the end?
